br.gov.sedurb.util

Class ADFUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.gov.sedurb.util.ADFUtils

  • public class ADFUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A series of convenience functions for dealing with ADF Bindings. Note: Updated for JDeveloper 11
